mapper.select: SELECT uca.contact_type, uca.apply_time, uca.status, uca.apply_info, ui.user_id, ui.nick_name, ui.sex, ui.personal_signature, ui.add_method, ui.area, ui.avatar FROM user_contact_apply uca JOIN user_info ui ON uca.receive_user_id = ui.user_id WHERE uca.apply_user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uca.apply_time DESC
